about_the_game:
Battle Sudoku allows players to play Sudoku with up to 8 other players or as a single player. There are various themes, game modes and (in our opinion) some motivating music to add a twist on the usual genre.

Features include:

- Single or Multiplayer (up to 8 players)
- 5 Levels of board difficulty
- 2 Game modes (Classic and Battle Royale)
- Set time limits per game
- Toggle basic assist helper for obvious errors
- Each board is completely unique (and generated algorithmically at play time)
- Intuitive number and helper number selection
- Basic themes with additional zen like water effect
- Banging Soundtrack (or not - your choice)
- Multilingual Support
- Continue existing game facility
- Some fun avatars
- Keep track of your top 10 scores for all level of difficulties

name: Battle Sudoku
short_description: Battle Sudoku allows players to play Sudoku with up to 8 other players or as a single player. There are various themes, game modes and some motivating music to add a twist on the usual genre.
